data.title: Famous Birthdays on March 28
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 28th of March. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on March 28.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 276

Charles I, Duke of Savoy (1482-90), born in Carignano, Piedmont (d. 1490)
